title: PFAS occurrence and distribution in yard waste compost indicate potential volatile loss, downward migration, and transformation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, 26,657-666
DOI: 10.1039/D3EM00538K, Communication
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Biraj Saha, Mohamed Ateia, Sujan Fernando, Jiale Xu, Thomas DeSutter, Syeed Md Iskander
This novel investigation revealed substantial PFAS contamination and plastic-PFAS co-occurrence in yard waste compost. Insights gained from the distribution of PFAS in compost are valuable for improving its management and application.
